name: A-Men 2
description: Prepare yourself for another journey through series of new worlds, featuring multiple challenges with many ways to pass a level and resolve puzzles. A-MEN 2 allows you to hang out with your good, old friends once more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium / AMD Athlon XP 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: I have played tons of games on my current PC. This game never launched, only tells me before crash: Your graphics card is not compatible with the game: 'Hardware compatible.'  PS: To make this review I just kept error message not closing for couple minutes, so Steam think I played it.
